thread.title: Zoo Atlanta Names Cockroach 'Tom Brady' | Roche | DC101
thread.title_full: Zoo Atlanta Names Cockroach 'Tom Brady' | Roche | DC101

title: Zoo Atlanta Names Cockroach 'Tom Brady' | Roche | DC101
text:
share 
If you are an Atlanta fan, it sucks that they lost...especially HOW they lost. It was made even worse for the Zoo Atlanta because they had made a bet with a RI zoo where the loser would have to name a baby animal after the opposing team's QB. 
Zoo Atlanta got the last laugh though as they chose a baby cockroach to bestow the honor of being called "Tom Brady" 
Well … the New England Patriots won #SuperBowlLI, so that means we lost our bet with Roger Williams Park Zoo & Carousel Village. Before the game, our two zoos decided the losing side would name one of their baby animals after the winning team’s star quarterback, and figuring the losing side would be pretty bitter about it, we came to the agreement that baby animal … would be a Madagascar hissing cockroach. So without further ado - Meet our newly-named Program Animal family! Posted by Zoo Atlanta on Monday, February 13, 2017 Weekdays 3-7PM on DC101.
